column2: Form the Defenders of Mari a female lead order dedicated to protecting our divine homelands, devoted to the deity Mari
Now that we have reformed our religion it is time we create a true religous hierarchy
No Funding Dedicated or Redirected towards the temples and clergy
Some funds have begun to be siphoned off to improve the conditions of the temples and clergy
Large ammounts of funds are being directed towards the religion and trying to revitalize it
Major subsidies have been invested into the temple complexes, priestly orders and clergy dedicated towards restoring the old ways of our people

After centries of neglect by the Hellenic Romans and then active persecution by the Christians and Muslims, the ancient Kemetic faith has deteriorated, by investing in the temples and priestly education perhaps we can begin to recover.
Form the Defenders of the Nile
After centuries of neglect, persecution and abandonment, the temples are funded, Egypt has been restored to a proper Kemetic power, we can now restore the ancient religion dedicated to Amun...
Go on a pilgrimage to the Temple of Isis at Philae
Go on a pilgrimage to the Siwa Oracle
